Uses of Package
adept.utilities

  • Packages that use adept.utilities 
    Package Description
    adept.io
    Provides I/O classes that handle reading/write files in different formats, including LDC Gigaword Corpus, ERE, CoNLL, email and plain text.
    adept.utilities
    Provides utility classes and functions for creating ADEPT Document objects, for tokenization, regression test, benchmark test, profiler, command-line application and file conversions.
  • Classes in adept.utilities used by adept.io 
    Class and Description
    PassageAttributes
    The Class PassageAttributes.
  • Classes in adept.utilities used by adept.utilities 
    Class and Description
    AdeptStressTest.OutFileWriter
    Nested class handles different kinds of files written by stress test.
    BenchmarkTest.TestFile
    The Class TestFile.
    CommandLineArgParse
    Parse DEFT command-line arguments using args4j.
    DeftReaderArgParse
    Parse DEFT command-line arguments using args4j.
    DocumentMaker
    Implements the white space tokenizer, simple text file parser and provides functionality to create a Document object using the aforementioned utilities.
    DocumentSaver
    Implements the white space tokenizer, simple text file parser and provides functionality to create a Document object using the aforementioned utilities.
    ISentenceSegmenter
    The Interface ITokenizer.
    ITokenizer
    The Interface ITokenizer.
    RegressionTest.TestFile
    The Class TestFile.
    StanfordSentenceSegmenter
    The Class StanfordSentenceSegmenter.
    StanfordTokenizer
    The Class StanfordTokenizer.
